snippet: Four journalists who broke news of government surveillance were among 30 reporters praised for their investigative work on Sunday.
abstract: Long Island University announces winners of 2013 George Polk Awards for excellence in journalism.
lead_paragraph: Four journalists who broke news of government surveillance were among 30 reporters praised for their investigative work on Sunday.

headline.main: Polk Awards Honor Articles on N.S.A. Surveillance
headline.print_headline: Polk Awards Honor Articles on N.S.A. Surveillance
